PlayRequirement.name: REQ_MINION_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must be a minion.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_FRIENDLY_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must be friendly.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ENEMY_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must be an enemy.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_DAMAGED_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must be damaged.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ENCHANTED_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must be enchanted.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_FROZEN_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must be frozen.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_CHARGE_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must have charge.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_MAX_ATTACK
PlayRequirement.description: Target must have a max atk of:

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_NONSELF_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Cannot target self.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_WITH_RACE
PlayRequirement.description: Target must have race:

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_TO_PLAY
PlayRequirement.description: Target is required to play power.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_NUM_MINION_SLOTS
PlayRequirement.description: # of available minion slots required:

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_WEAPON_EQUIPPED
PlayRequirement.description: Player must have a weapon.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ENOUGH_MANA
PlayRequirement.description: Player must have enough mana.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_YOUR_TURN
PlayRequirement.description: Must be your turn.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_NONSTEALTH_ENEMY_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Enemy target cannot be stealthed.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_HERO_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must be a hero.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_SECRET_CAP
PlayRequirement.description: Must have open slot for secret.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_MINION_CAP_IF_TARGET_AVAILABLE
PlayRequirement.description: If a target is available, # of minion slots required:

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_MINION_CAP
PlayRequirement.description: Cannot exceed minion cap.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_ATTACKED_THIS_TURN
PlayRequirement.description: Target must have already attacked this turn.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_IF_AVAILABLE
PlayRequirement.description: If one is available, target is required.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_MINIMUM_ENEMY_MINIONS
PlayRequirement.description: Minimum # of enemy minions that must be in play:

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_FOR_COMBO
PlayRequirement.description: Target required if it's a combo and targets are available.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_NOT_EXHAUSTED_ACTIVATE
PlayRequirement.description: Cannot activate when exhausted.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_UNIQUE_SECRET
PlayRequirement.description: Secret must be unique.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_TAUNTER
PlayRequirement.description: Default attack power must target taunters

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_CAN_BE_ATTACKED
PlayRequirement.description: Target cannot have the tag 'can't be attacked.'

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ACTION_PWR_IS_MASTER_PWR
PlayRequirement.description: Can't use an action power that's not the master power.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_MAGNET
PlayRequirement.description: Must target magnet (enemy) minion if one exists.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ATTACK_GREATER_THAN_0
PlayRequirement.description: Attack must be greater than zero on default attack power.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ATTACKER_NOT_FROZEN
PlayRequirement.description: Attacker cannot be frozen.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_HERO_OR_MINION_TARGET
PlayRequirement.description: Target must be a hero or minion.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_CAN_BE_TARGETED_BY_SPELLS
PlayRequirement.description: Can be targeted by spells.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_SUBCARD_IS_PLAYABLE
PlayRequirement.description: At least one subcard must be playable, if subcards exist.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_FOR_NO_COMBO
PlayRequirement.description: Target required if it's NOT a combo and targets are available.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_NOT_MINION_JUST_PLAYED
PlayRequirement.description: Minions cannot attack the turn they are played.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_NOT_EXHAUSTED_HERO_POWER
PlayRequirement.description: Hero powers can only be played once per turn.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_CAN_BE_TARGETED_BY_OPPONENTS
PlayRequirement.description: Target cannot have the tag 'can't be targeted by opponents.'

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ATTACKER_CAN_ATTACK
PlayRequirement.description: This minion cannot attack if it has the tag 'can't attack.'

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_TARGET_MIN_ATTACK
PlayRequirement.description: Target must have a minimum atk of:

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_CAN_BE_TARGETED_BY_HERO_POWERS
PlayRequirement.description: Target cannot have the tag 'can't be targeted by hero powers.'

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ENEMY_TARGET_NOT_IMMUNE
PlayRequirement.description: Enemy target cannot be immune.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_ENTIRE_ENTOURAGE_NOT_IN_PLAY
PlayRequirement.description: Entire entourage cannot already be in play.

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_MINIMUM_TOTAL_MINIONS
PlayRequirement.description: Minimum # of total minions that must be in play:

PlayRequirement.name: REQ_MUST_TARGET_TAUNTER
PlayRequirement.description: Must ALWAYS target taunters
